description.p:
Islamic prayer times (Adhan) and Qur'an application that is highly customizable, free and open source. Muezzin supports many languages, advanced prayer options and many more.
Keywords: Athan, Adhan, Azan, Islam, Muslim, Prayers, times, Muezzin, Salah, Salat, Namaz, Islamic, Hijri, Quran, Qur'an, Koran.

ul.li: Added previous/next buttons in the Qur'an reader.
Removed necessary modules => loading speeds improved
Notifications now contain the Muezzin logo.
Almost complete remake of the settings variables (for a better code), you might have to set a few settings.
Arabic fonts for Qur'an reader are loaded before the text now, no flickering.
Timezone changes now affect the whole program, not only the time tables.
Only looking for updates when UI has finished loading.
